About Us

What started as a grassroots movement in 2014 has turned into an official NGO in 2015. In this short period of time, Girls Coding Kosova has managed to organize and implement fifty-nine (59) different activities such as meet-ups, workshops, boot camps, trainings, and presentations that have engaged a total of 3,751 participants. In 2016, GCK was awarded the FIDES Award and in 2017 the Albanian Woman in ICT Award.
